text:
If there is already 
<<
# Bring in additional module-specific configurations
#
<IfModule mod_ssl.c>
    Include conf/ssl.conf
</IfModule>
>> part of the file, 
add also
<<
#LoadModule ssl_module modules/mod_ssl.so
>> and some statement that it is not part of the default distribution (see also:
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=15630) as well as some
hint on how to obtain it.
creator: hauser@acm.org
slive@apache.org
text:
In general, httpd.conf is not the documentation.  We expect people to
read the real docs.

But this small change might be worthwhile.

Thanks for your suggestions.  (Just please try to group them a little
better in the future.)

If you would like to further help us enhance the mod_ssl docs, please
feel free to join the docs@httpd.apache.org mailing list.
